# ps-mysql-select
PowerShell で MySQL を読み出す

## add settings.json ( Code Runner )
```javascript
    "code-runner.showRunIconInEditorTitleMenu": false,
    "code-runner.executorMap": {
        "powershell": "powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Unrestricted"
    }
```
## 実行結果
